about_the_game:
Welcome to Kuru!

Step into a beautiful hand-drawn world and guide Kuru, a clever and curious fox, along the challenging journey back to a cozy home. Every level presents a unique, calming challenge that lets you reorganize furniture, reorient regions, and clear paths to help unravel the story of a little fox navigating life’s obstacles.

Featuring...

  • Reorganize the World, Solve Puzzles
    Use strategy and spatial awareness to place each piece in just the right spot and open a clear path for Kuru. Every move draws you closer to unveiling another part of the journey!

  • Hand Drawn Art
    Immerse yourself in a visually charming world crafted with care, where every detail is soulfully illustrated to bring Kuru’s warm and wondrous environment to life.

  • Relaxing Lo-Fi Soundtrack
    Tune into custom-made, calming lo-fi music that surrounds you in a peaceful, cozy atmosphere as you guide Kuru home.

  • Levels Full of Discovery

    Each level is its own unique challenge with fresh obstacles. Can you piece together the path and help Kuru reach their destination?

Set off on a path of discovery, where every decision shapes Kuru’s journey. Each step reveals new challenges for you and Kuru to overcome together. Kuru’s counting on you to find the way home!

Credits

All assets and music are made inhouse by SolBreak Studios LLC.

This makes us sound fancy, but we have no idea what we are doing.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.5 or later
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 2.0+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: KURU

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit / Windows 8 64-Bit / Windows 8.1 64-Bit / Windows 10 64-Bit / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K / AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 Ti / AMD Radeon™ R7 360
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Help Kuru go home! However, Kuru is a bit... of a neat freak, so he can't leave until he cleans up everything along the way! From teahouses to bamboo forests to shrines, KURU comes with 5 regions and 125+ handcrafted levels for you to rearrange and relax to!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Simplified Chinese*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
